document.full_text: after a competitive bidding process, toshiba has emerged as the sole potential buyer for landis & gyr, a swiss smart-metering company, in a deal that could be worth more than $2 billion.
document.title: toshiba in discussions to buy landis & gyr
lines_and_colors: after a competitive bidding process, toshiba has emerged as the sole potential buyer for landis & gyr, a swiss smart-metering company, in a deal that could be worth more than $2 billion.
